    • Linear Model with Ensemble Covariate

    Linear Model with Ensemble Covariate

    Thorsten Simon

    2019-10-14

    linear_model.Rmd
    library("ensemblr")
set.seed(111)
    n <- 100
k <- 25
x_mean <- runif(n, -3, 3)
d <- data.frame(
  y = rnorm(n, mean = x_mean)
)

d$x <- as_ensemble(
  replicate(k, rnorm(n, mean = x_mean))
)

rm(x_mean)

dim(d)
    ## [1] 100   2

    plot(y ~ x[, 1], data = d)

    plot(y ~ mean(x), data = d)

# lm(y ~ x[, 1], data = d)
fm <- lm(y ~ mean(x), data = d)
summary(fm)
